H0.text: Which English king was married to Catherine of Braganza from 1662 to 1685. Charles II

H1.text: Which English king was married to Catherine of Braganza from 1662 to 1685. James II

H2.text: Which English king was married to Catherine of Braganza from 1662 to 1685. Henry VIII

H3.text: Which English king was married to Catherine of Braganza from 1662 to 1685. Charles 6

A4.text: Charles II dismissed the offer of the Spanish government, and chose to marry Catherine because of her huge dowry.
